creator: pierre.thierry@moine-fou.org
text:
It would be nice to have a directive like VirtualDocumentRoot that is used if no
directory matches the host.

httpd.conf :
  VirtualDocumentRoot /var/www/vhosts/%0
  VirtualDocumentRootFallback /var/www/vhost-fallback/

Directory /var/www :
  vhosts/www.domain.tld/
  vhosts/wap.domain.tld/
  vhost-fallback/

And the GET anything.domain.tld/page.html will return
/var/www/vhost-fallback/page.html
